name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect Google Video Search to YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects Google Search's 'Videos' button to search on YouTube. Adds a right-click menu option to search selected text on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of lackluster results from Googleâ€™s video search? This extension makes your life easier by redirecting the "Videos" button on Google Search to perform the same search directly on YouTube.

It also adds a convenient right-click menu option, allowing you to highlight any text on a webpage and search for it directly on YouTube.
